page.title: 03HOUSING IN WEST LEOMINSTER
page.content: There are two housing estates in the east of the area - one private and one mixed - both built in the last fifteen years. Some of these houses are built on the site of a second world war U.S. Military Hospital. Apart from these estates the housing is isolated and scattered consisting mostly of old farmhouses and cottages, some of which are tied cottages. Some are in the old traditional black and white style, which is a feature of the county in general. Some building is still taking place, but the estates are nearing completion.
